greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x) * (1 - x^4) / ((1 - x^2) * (1 - x^3)) in powers of x.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-1, -1).
formula: G.f. A(x) satisfies 0 = f(A(x), A(x^2)) where f(u, v) = 2 - v - u * (4 - 2*v - u).
a(-n) = -a(n) unless n=0. a(n+3) = a(n) unless n=0 or n=-3.
xref: A106510(n) = -a(n) unless n=0. Convolution inverse of A117659.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 04 2009
